advancement.level: You gain one level for completing this adventure.
advancement.note: If you decline this level, you still record legacy events but cannot claim any rewards or legacy event benefits for this adventure. If the character died, they can be raised, but they receive no rewards from the adventure (you may still choose Legacy Events).
